mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.name AS extra__writer, B.name AS extra__boardName FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id INNER JOIN board AS B ON A.boardId = B.id WHERE A.id =#{id}
